body:
# Check in ~ 30 mins
>Face-time is important too

- [ ] Attend a video check-in with your cohort facilitator :deciduous_tree: *This is an important check-in, - you are expected to attend one check-in per week (you're welcome to both). If you miss both weekly checkins, please state why in a waffle comment below, and submit this assignment*.
title: Check in ~ 30 mins
